name: Pups and Prejudice
description:
Visual novel/dating sim based on Pride and Prejudice*
*BUT WITH DOGS

Plays in internet browser.

This is a work in progress, made for my first game jam. http://myfirstgamejam.tumblr.com/

This is my first game that wasn't blindly following a tutorial so I've learnt a lot. I will be working on adding the following:

  • Add the rest of the story paths (including puppy Mr Wickham, scandals and other people/competition)
  • Fix spellings I guess
  • Backgrounds for each location
  • A prettier border
  • Music
